amendment.description: To strike the funding offset for the coverage under the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program of atomic weapons employees employed at facilities during periods of residual contamination, previously agreed to on June 16, 2004, was further modified.

action.text: Amendment SA 3438, as previously agreed to, was further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3438 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3438 proposed by Senator Bunning for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S6837-6847) To strike the funding offset for the coverage under the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program of atomic weapons employees employed at facilities during periods of residual contamination, previously agreed to on June 16, 2004, was further modified.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3438 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3438 proposed by Senator Bunning for Senator McConnell.
